Sequence Information.Target Organism: Tumor cells:U-373MG ATCC (IC50=20.94±5.18 μM ); U-87MG ATCC (IC50=29.20±7.96 μM); SH-SY5Y (IC50=93.80±2.17 μM )
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: hRBC(human blood red cells):IC50=155±13.04 μM (testing time is 48 h)
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: Vero(African green monkey kidney):IC50≥100 μM (testing time is 48 h); PBMC(Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cells):IC50=4.16±1.94 μM (testing time is 48 h); GM00637:IC50 ≥ 100 μM

Literature.Title: The synthetic peptide LyeTxI-b derived from Lycosa erythrognatha spider venom is cytotoxic to U-87 MG glioblastoma cells
Literature.Author: Abdel-Salam MAL, Carvalho-Tavares J, Gomes KS, Teixeira-Carvalho A, Kitten GT, Nyffeler J, Dias FF, Dos Reis PVM, Pimenta AMC, Leist M, de Lima ME, de Souza-Fagundes EM.

Literature.Title: LyeTxI-b, a Synthetic Peptide Derived From Lycosa erythrognatha Spider Venom, Shows Potent Antibiotic Activity in Vitro and in Vivo
Literature.Author: Reis PVM, Boff D, Verly RM, Melo-Braga Mn, Cortes ME, Santos DM, Pimenta AMC, Amaral FA, Resende JM
